name: eCommerce Positioning
overview:
SEM services offered from a search engine marketing Seattle WA based company specializing in Seattle website promotion and search engine positioning Seattle companies and those around the country.

It is important to note that each search engine has its own algorithm and that these formulas change periodically. Consequently, a site’s rankings will often move around from period to period and vary from search engine to search engine. Part of our job at ECommerce Positioning is to follow these changes and help our clients determine if and when changes need to be made. The other part is to help you prioritize your efforts in regards to the following factors. Keyword Research & Analysis Homepage Content Relevancy Optimized Keywords W3C Valid Format Submissions to Major Search Engines Implementation Consulting & On-Going Review Link Popularity Campaign Static Link Mapping Blog Marketing & Authentic Copy XML Sitemap Search Engine Rank Monitoring

Web 2.0 Service Includes:

Create Blog

* Set up a Search Engine Friendly Blog.
* New blog domain name.
* Hosting of domain name and blog.
* Professional Design of a full blog site created by only the best in the eCommerce world.
* Integration of social bookmarking links and RSS into the blog.
* Changing your blog site to look like professional full eCommerce website.

Intelligent Press Release

* Creatively written, optimized press release.
* Includes links back to clientâ€™s primary website and blog.
* Launched to mainstream and online media, including sites that receive over 50 million page views per month such as Google and Yahoo!

Directory Submissions

* Hand submissions to the top 50 web directories and internet portals

Tracking Reports

* Tracking and Ranking Reports for you blog website.

Article Writing

* Writing Articles on the 16 major search engines to Dominate google ranking.
